        runOrderObject -
        model -
        Returns:

      • handleRunNotes

        @RequestMapping(value="/KaligiaRunResult",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public boolean handleRunNotes(@RequestParam(value="run_id")
                                                                                                                       int runID,
                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="notes")
                                                                                                                       java.lang.String resultNotes)
        Saves Result Notes to Run in DB after a Run.
        Parameters:
        runID - Run ID of the Run
        resultNotes - Result Notes entered by User
        Returns:
        True if Result Notes were saved, False if there was an error in saving or if passed result notes is blank.

 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<Subject> searchPatient(@RequestParam(value="name")

                                                                                                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Searches for patients using partial information and returns a list of matching Subjects
        Parameters:
        name - Value entered in Filter for Given Name
        lastName - Value entered in Filter for Last Name
        date - Value entered in Filter for Date of Birth
        Returns:
        List of Active Subjects that matched the filter values passed

        java.lang.Exception

      • getvitalHistory

        @RequestMapping(value="/getvitalHistory",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getvitalHistory(@RequestParam(value="subjectIdforVitals")
                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Integer subjectIdforVitals,
                                                                                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                                         throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException,
                                                                                                                                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException,
                                                                                                                                                java.io.IOException
        Get the Vital History Record details for the patient
        Parameters:
        subjectIdforVitals - Subject ID
        request -
        Returns:
        A list of String where each value is the Run ID of the Run where the vitals were recorded and the date in the form [Run ID]-[Date of Run]
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException
        java.io.IOException

      • getCaF2Calibration

        @RequestMapping(value="/getCaF2Calibration",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.Object[] getCaF2Calibration(@RequestParam(value="emitterId")
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.String emitterId,
                                                                                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                                  throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException,
                                                                                                                                         com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException,
                                                                                                                                         java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                                         java.lang.Exception
        Collects CaF2 Calibration Data by Running Acquisition on Spectrometer for blank sample and for different incremental integration times Caches the data in caF2CalibrationDataMap and caF2CalibrationSpectrometerId
        Parameters:
        emitterId - unique ID of registered SseEmitter in statusEmitterMap. This is used to send messages to the Front end.
        request -
        Returns:
        An Object Array where first item is the Spectrometer ID and second item is a Map whose key is integrationTime and Value is Spectrum Data as a Repeat object
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

      • saveCaF2CalibrationData

        @RequestMapping(value="/saveCaF2CalibrationData",

 @Transactional(rollbackFor=java.lang.Exception.class)

public boolean saveCaF2CalibrationData(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                                                                                         throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                java.io.IOException,
                                                                                                                                                                                                java.lang.Exception
        Saves the CaF2 Calibration Data in DB from cache - caF2CalibrationDataMap and caF2CalibrationSpectrometerId
        Parameters:
        request -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParseException
        com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonMappingException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception
